name: donc-pdf-server
description: PDF generator for Declaration of Decontamination (DONC)

scripts.install-admin: if [ -d "admin-app" ]; then cd admin-app && npm install; else echo 'admin-app missing, skipping install'; fi
scripts.build-admin: if [ -d "admin-app" ]; then cd admin-app && npm run build; else echo 'admin-app missing, skipping build'; fi
scripts.build: npm run install-admin && npm run build-admin && npm install
